attributes.action: stop using revenue as a controlling factor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everything from congestion to pollution to refuse collection is having a price put on it to control our consumption of it. I want the government to introduce more schemes that actively control the consumption without imposing financial constraints.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=stealth+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
